comment.author: 8273909@N05
comment._content:
If this had been a color photo...

It's hard for many of us to imagine, but less than a century ago (until end of 1914), 
french soldiers were still dressed in the blue coats and bright red trousers of 1870.
Certainly impressive in XIXth century 
or on parade at the Champs Elysées,
not to mention appreciated by german machinegunners.
